entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: SE 23 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this morning then to rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
